name: Evading AI Behavioral Tracking
description: Techniques for disrupting AI-driven behavioral analysis and predictive tracking systems.

cards.title: Understanding AI Predictive Behavior Analysis
cards.description: How AI monitors, predicts, and manipulates human behavior through data tracking.
bulletpoints: How AI builds behavioral profiles based on online and offline activity.
Identifying key data points used in predictive tracking.
How AI-assisted psychological warfare influences decision-making.
cards.summaryText: Explains AI profiling inputs, critical data reveals, and psyops loops used to steer choices.

cards.title: Disrupting AI Pattern Recognition
cards.description: Techniques to confuse AI tracking systems and prevent accurate profiling.
bulletpoints: Using randomness and unpredictability in online and offline behaviors.
Disrupting machine learning datasets through false data injection.
Leveraging behavioral noise to break AI surveillance models.
cards.summaryText: Details randomness tactics, data poisoning, and noise generation to derail pattern recognition.

cards.title: Masking Digital and Physical Presence
cards.description: Techniques for minimizing AI's ability to track, predict, and manipulate individuals.
bulletpoints: Using VPNs, proxies, and decentralized communication to hide online activities.
Strategies for maintaining anonymity in high-surveillance zones.
How to use deception tactics to create misleading data trails.
cards.summaryText: Covers network masking, on-the-ground anonymity, and decoy trail construction against predictive AI.
